task.summary: Update the watch face based on the config, first basically working version
The initial choice on the list is the currently selected instrument
Proper package name for handheld apk
The default value should be in the array!
Added TAG, just in case I need to log anything
Protect initial setup from bad config value, added TAG, just in case I need to log anything
That file is not needed any more
Code polish, dynamic hand creation (based on the instrument name), neater graphical layout
Make hour hand a bit shorter
Unneeded white, bad in black config
Autogenerated code updated by IDE upgrade
Big change in the configuration, UI and backend
Make all instruments independent. First step to combinability. Pairs are defined in string arrays - so can be split to 2 config screens
Separate chosing of mins and hours. First draft
A bit of cleanup in logging

MESSAGE.value: Autogenerated code updated by IDE upgrade
Big change in the configuration, UI and backend
Make all instruments independent. First step to combinability. Pairs are defined in string arrays - so can be split to 2 config screens
Separate chosing of mins and hours. First draft
A bit of cleanup in logging

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Android Studio update
